message: Behind it is a cavernous room. A man stands at its center.

name: 東江
message: "I've been waiting for you, Aoba."
Toue!

name: 東江
message: "You kept your promise. I appreciate that."

name: 東江
message: "I asked you here alone so that we could have a nice, long chat. I'm not sure your friends would have had the patience for that."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Yeah? I've got a few things to say to you too."

name: 東江
message: "Then our needs coincide. Excellent."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'll get right to the point. What are you after?"

name: 東江
message: "Whatever do you mean?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Granny told me what you've been doing on the island."

name: 東江
message: "Dr. Seragaki... And what did you think when you learned of my plans?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "It's not gonna end with Midorijima, is it?"
Toue's smile grows.

name: 東江
message: "Smart man. You're correct. This island is just the beginning."

name: 東江
message: "I intend to declare independence, to make Midorijima a new nation."

name: 蒼葉
message: "A nation?"

name: 東江
message: "Indeed. This island is critical to my research. I won't surrender it to anyone. However, a flag alone will not be enough."

name: 東江
message: "I require a powerful nation, and that means a powerful military. Weapons, troops, capital."

name: 東江
message: "But the more powerful a nation becomes, the more its people tend to rebel."

<4line><voice name='東江' class='東江' src='voice/dm55/8000190b02'>
"Societal norms teach them to value peace, both in their own lives and as a moral virtue. They demand that their country keep them safe, while at the same time decrying the buildup of power that requires."

name: 東江
message: "They do not see the contradiction, that without a strong military, the nation would not exist."

name: 東江
message: "They don't like how their home makes them feel, so they tear it down, and without any thought as to where they'll live next."

name: 東江
message: "And even when they do give it some thought, they fail to put their vision into practice. It's sadly far too common a tale."

name: 東江
message: "I don't particularly care for half measures. If the will of my people is my greatest obstacle, then I must start by bringing them in line."

name: 東江
message: "Fortunately, I now have the means to create what every leader has dreamt of. A people that will not resist, because they will not want to resist."

name: 東江
message: "Rule through fear is inherently unstable. But I will need no secret police, no public executions."

name: 東江
message: "My people will give their lives with perfect―yes, religious―faith, never doubting for even a heartbeat that they do so of their own free will."

name: 東江
message: "As far as methods of murder go―"

name: 東江
message: "―is there any more elegant, more dramatic than this?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "And I guess you'll be the glorious leader."

name: 東江
message: "Inevitably, as I'm the one who planned it all."

name: 蒼葉
message: "So you want your own country. What then? You gonna be satisfied playing king?"

name: 東江
message: "You misunderstand. My ambitions are not so crass. I have no desire for wealth or even power."

name: 東江
message: "What I desire is a challenge. I want to see just how far I can go."

name: 蒼葉
message: "A challenge... Who the hell are you fighting?"

name: 東江
message: "No one in particular. Though at the risk of sounding hackneyed... I supposed you could say that I'm challenging fate itself."

name: 東江
message: "So long as fate is on my side, than nothing and no one can stop me."

name: 東江
message: "That I've made it this far proves that I remain fate's chosen."

name: 蒼葉
message: "So you're gonna keep going until something stops you?"

name: 東江
message: "Indeed. I want to know just how much control one man can exert over human minds."

name: 東江
message: "I will continue to expand the scope of my research until fate decides to end me."

name: 東江
message: "As is, however, my victory is all but assured. Rather boring, don't you think? A game needs obstacles to be fun."

name: 蒼葉
message: "So this is a game to you? What does that make us? Pawns?"

name: 東江
message: "Life is a game, Aoba. Not just for me. Everyone is fighting with everyone else for dominance."

name: 東江
message: "Am I wrong?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...I don't really give a shit what you think. I'm not your fucking pawn."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Same goes for my friends. I'm not letting you use us any more."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You crazy fuck, dragging us all into some kinda deranged experiment."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I'm taking Sei back too!"

name: 東江
message: "Sei is quite precious to me, you know. My plans could not have progressed so far without him."

name: 東江
message: "And now you, his other half, are standing before me. What else could you call this but fate?"

name: 東江
message: "You twins are the finest pieces fate has seen fit to provide me."
What the hell is he saying?! Sei and I are just pieces?!
Anger swells in my chest. No fucking way!

name: 蒼葉
message: "...You piece of shit. You're not getting away with this. Where do you get off, huh? Treating people like tools... You really think I'm just gonna go along with that?!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "You're human, just like the rest of us!"

name: 東江
message: "As a formality, I suppose I should ask."

name: 東江
message: "Do you have any inclination at all to join me?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "What do you think?"

name: 東江
message: "Heh. I see that's out of the question. I take it you intend to be my enemy, then?"

name: 東江
message: "A man with the same power as Sei... Yes, I suspect you'll be my greatest obstacle yet."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Enough of your bullshit! I just can't stand you. That's all the reason I need."

name: 東江
message: "Very well. Either way, it's a simple question. You or me. Only one of us can win. And I know just the place for our climactic showdown."

name: 東江
message: "You know it well. That place where naked souls clash, where there is nowhere to run and nowhere to hide. Let's see then, shall we, which of us fate favors."

name: 蓮
message: "Aoba!"
